title: Constructivist Game-Based Learning (GBL) Design: Practical Applications in Language Education

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational language education theory and practical teaching experience
context.additional_context: Strengthening learner-centered instructional design capabilities using gamification elements for in-service language education practitioners

learning_goals: Students can develop language education scenarios using three GBL design frameworks based on constructivist learning principles
Students can analyze and improve two or more learner interaction barriers in games by applying an extended cognitive walkthrough model
Students can create one project prototype applicable to real language classroom settings using collaborative digital game tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
